statements: SELECT * FROM game_currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type FROM game_currency_transactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, transaction_amount FROM game_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM game_currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount), MAX(transaction_amount), MIN(transaction_amount) FROM game_currency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM game_currency_transactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM game_currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM game_currency_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM game_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT player_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM game_currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM CurrencyTransactions;
SELECT player_id, currency_amount, transaction_type FROM CurrencyTransactions WHERE currency_amount > 1000;
SELECT player_name, total_currency_balance FROM Players WHERE total_currency_balance < 5000 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CurrencyTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-08-01 00:00:00' AND transaction_date <= '2021-08-31 23:59:59';
SELECT player_name, total_currency_balance FROM Players ORDER BY total_currency_balance DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CurrencyTransactions WHERE currency_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_currency_balance FROM Players WHERE total_currency_balance < 5000 ORDER BY total_currency_balance ASC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(currency_amount) AS total_amount FROM CurrencyTransactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT player_name, currency_amount FROM Players JOIN CurrencyTransactions ON Players.player_id = CurrencyTransactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(currency_amount) AS avg_amount, MIN(currency_amount) AS min_amount, MAX(currency_amount) AS max_amount FROM CurrencyTransactions;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions;
SELECT game_title, developer, genre FROM games;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM players WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT game_title, genre FROM games WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY game_title ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT player_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM currency_transactions JOIN players ON currency_transactions.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM indie_games;
SELECT game_title, genre, release_date FROM indie_games;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT game_title, genre FROM indie_games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.player_name, g.game_title, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN players p ON t.player_id = p.player_id JOIN indie_games g ON t.game_id = g.game_id;

SELECT p.player_name, t.transaction_amount, c.currency_name FROM players p JOIN transactions t ON p.player_id = t.player_id JOIN currencies c ON t.currency_id = c.currency_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 50;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email, coins FROM players WHERE coins > 100
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT player_name, coins FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50
SELECT * FROM players WHERE coins > 1000 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE purchases.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_name, transaction_type, amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT player_name, item_name, purchase_date FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id JOIN items ON purchases.item_name = items.item_name ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
